Me and Jen made a small bet on who's writing is better, so I'm gonna 
try to make this post good.


::Zardus/FZ::

A door in the Iron Fist opened, letting Zardus enter the lab. It 
closed behind him and he looked around, wondering why the orb had 
ordered him to go here. The lab was a standard lab for bot 
maintanence. The room was dotted with equipment for fixing and 
improving bots of all sizes. The impressive part was a large console 
in the front of the room, which had control of the entire lab. Zardus 
walked to the console chair and sat down, waiting for the Vok to 
start whatever it wanted him here for. He didn't have to wait long. 
In several seconds, the orb flickered.

"Why'd you bring me here?" Zardus asked using his mind, glancing down 
at the blue sphere. He didn't have to wait long for the responce.

"You're weak. Your clone barely lived at the Cybertronian Fire, and 
his body is stronger than yours." Was the Vok's explanation. It 
didn't sound mad or upset; its words were merely a statement.

"My clone was fighting four bots, th-" Zardus pointed out, but a 
spasm of pain sent by the orb caused him to fall off his seat in 
pain. He climbed back onto the seat, groaning in pain and thankful 
that the room was soundproof. He knew that the orb had already 
disabled all monitoring devices, just like it had done on the last 
time it had met with him. The orb made the room invisible by simply 
erasing it from the computer. According to the Iron Fist, Lab 4 
didn't even exist. There were no functions that could be called up 
from anywhere in the ship into that room; even the lights were slowly 
flickering off and dying. Zardus took several deep breaths to recover 
from the pain.

"Now, as I was saying," the orb continued, "Your body needs to be 
improved. I will supervise the improvements."

Zardus nodded and stood up. The orb was already placing instructions 
inside his mind, telling him to go to a machine in the back of the 
lab and lay down in the space provided. He walked passed all the 
equipment, coming up to the machine specified and laying down on a 
panel that was built to support bots. The panel slid into the machine 
and a procedure began, guided by the Vok.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ smiles, watching the reports of the huge blast of the rebels. It 
was complete. He taps a few buttons and the gass stops, water pouring 
out from various to wash it away. Drones were already on their way to 
clean it up.

"Alliance bots," he says over the comm, "The rebellion has been 
quelled. There is currently an attack taking place on Hell Beast's 
base. I'm encouraging you to attack, though its not too big a 
priority right now."

FZ taps a few buttons, taking the Alliance base off lockdown.
